Location: Vancouver, BC Hybrid - In-Office 3 Days, Remote 2 Days Position Overview: We are looking for a motivated and enthusiastic Engineering Intern to join our talented engineering team. This internship provides an excellent opportunity for students enrolled in computer science, software engineering, or a related field to gain hands-on experience in software development, project collaboration, and technology implementation within a dynamic environment. What you'll do: • Software Development: Assist software engineers in designing, developing, testing, and debugging applications and features within the Boomi platform. • Collaboration: Work in a collaborative team environment, participating in code reviews, team meetings, and project discussions to gain insights into Agile development processes. • Product Testing: Help develop and execute unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance tests to ensure software quality and functionality. • Documentation: Contribute to the creation and maintenance of technical documentation, including design specifications, user manuals, and process documentation. • Research and Analysis: Conduct research on emerging technologies and best practices to support engineering initiatives and recommend improvements. • Troubleshooting: Assist in identifying and resolving technical issues by analyzing logs, debugging code, and working with other team members. Job Requirements The Experience You Bring: • Currently enrolled in a Bachelor's or Master's program in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. • Familiarity with programming languages such as Java, Python, or JavaScript. • Understanding of software development principles and methodologies, including Agile and DevOps practices. • Problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically about software functionality and performance. • Strong communication and teamwork abilities, with a willingness to learn from others. • Eagerness to take on new challenges and apply theoretical knowledge in practical, real-world scenarios.
